spells.name: Command Plants
spells.description: Sway the actions of plant creatures.

spells.name: Diminish Plants
spells.description: Reduces size or blights growth of normal plants.

spells.name: Neutralize Poison
spells.description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

spells.name: Repel Vermin
spells.description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

spells.name: Summon Nature's Ally III
spells.description: Summons creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Tree Shape
spells.description: You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.

spells.name: Water Walk
spells.description: Subject treads on water as if solid.
